title: Building permits (residential, commercial, industrial)
dataVerified: Permit holder, contractor, property address, construction details, approved plans
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (issued/expired/revoked). Link to building department system (contractors and public, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake building permits. Domain binding verifies building department. Construction site posting requirement. Code enforcement verification. Permanent building records. Prevents unpermitted construction fraud.
